name: hubot-etcd-brain

0.1.0.name: hubot-etcd-brain
0.1.0.readme:
hubot-etcd-brain
================

Hubot brain that uses [etcd](https://github.com/coreos/etcd).

## How do stuff

0. `npm install hubot-etcd-brain`
0. Add `"hubot-etcd-brain"` to `external-scripts.json`
0. Eat a sammich

## Configuration

``` bash
HUBOT_ETCD_BRAIN_KEY='/hubot-brain/brain-dump'

HUBOT_ETCD_HOST='localhost'
HUBOT_ETCD_PORT='4001'
HUBOT_ETCD_CA_FILE='/path/to/ca.pem'
HUBOT_ETCD_CERT_FILE='/path/to/cert.pem'
HUBOT_ETCD_KEY_FILE='/path/to/key.pem'
```
